Params[3]: Are you certain?
We haven't investigated the lower third floor and the west wing ourselves yet, but the evidence we've collected so far is proof enough.
The Ascendants have amassed a large amount of Red Tide at the reservoir on the lowest level of the aquarium through the underground waterways.
So they never stopped trying to spread the Red Tide to the ocean.

Hmph. So they've been spreading those rumors to draw our attention away from this. Sending the Red Tide to the ocean through the waterways otherwise would be ineffective and easily detected by our satellites.
But we'd be powerless to stop them if they released the Red Tide after amassing a large volume, no matter how quickly we detected it afterward.
The result of the simulation is in.
I'll skip ahead to the conclusion. At maximum capacity, the amount of Red Tide they release will contaminate the entire ocean in two months.
Can we hit them with the Longinus Arsenal as we did?
I'm afraid not. The Red Tide isn't exposed on the surface this time. There are high-strength structures and a sizable volume of water above it.
The Longinus Arsenal would lose most of its energy puncturing the structures above. What's left is incapable of vaporizing the water.
They didn't transfer this volume of Red Tide in a day or two. They've been doing a great job hiding their activity from us.
We're only noticing this because they were luring the Scarlet Revelation to the aquarium. Why would they do something that could expose their plan?
I think... it's for an experiment.
An experiment?
Yes. They have seemingly discovered a way to expedite the process of evolving the Hetero-Creatures from the Red Tide.
It didn't take long for the disappeared squad to become part of a Hetero-Creature after the Red Tide devoured them.
What?!
Even the usually calm Asimov looks surprised alongside Nikola and Hassen.
The Ascendants must be involved. Asimov, factor in this variable and run the simulation again.
On it... Done. Factoring in the speed they're evolving now, the number of Hetero-Creatures will grow by 127 times even before the ocean is completely contaminated.
We have to stop this. Let's use the Omega Weapons we salvaged from the moon.
Those are all the Omega Weapons we have before we can restore the lunar base.
Now's the time to show our cards. We shouldn't need many if we only deploy the Omega Weapons on the lower third floor.
Don't forget that you're not authorized to use those Omega Weapons. Many in the Parliament are hoping to use them to clear the remaining Punishing Virus from the moon and rebuild the lunar base.
If we don't have enough evidence to verify the threat, getting them to approve it is a pipe dream.
We need comprehensive footage at the very least.
The Purifying Force will continue to explore the lower third level after this call. We will be uploading the relevant footage as quickly as possible.
Hassen does not answer. Beyond his terminal's view, the Purifying Force members are silently inspecting their gears and preparing to descend further.
Looking at the captain he handpicked himself, Hassen eventually nods.
I'll start preparing a team to transport the Omega Weapons. Be careful.
We will.
Let's get going if we're done with the bureaucracy.
Not yet. We still need to leave a few people here to protect the refugees.
Many in the Purifying Force frown upon hearing that.
Our priority should be investigating the lower third floor. It will end up costing us if we are even just one person short of delivering the intel.
We can't put innocent people at risk. Not to mention that we need to secure an exit as well.
Hah. How innocent can they be when they voluntarily came here for the Ascendants?
The Purifying Force member sneers.
But I agree with the rest of what you said. Everyone?
The members look at each other before a few of them promptly fall back.
We'll leave this place to you.
The Purifying Force is inexperienced in defensive operations. Keeping a seasoned fighter like Lucia here can certainly mitigate some risks.
Understood. Are you going to follow Bianca, Commandant?

Params[2]: The Deep M.I.N.D. connection has a limited range. I have to go with her.

Params[3]: I see. Please be careful.
I'll guard the refugees and the exit with the Purifying Force.
You fist-bump Lucia before proceeding with the advance team.
